'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

##  Background 

{{Description|The man at the bar goes about his business in merry defiance of the fact that he appears to be semi-decomposed.

Behind him, a dwarf hangs upside down over a barrel. Blood streams down into the bucket from a wound in his wrist. From time the time the dwarf twitches feebly.}}

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Food and drink - mainly a collection of kith-based food items. Sells the [Grave Hound Pup](/graveHoundPup/)
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* The tavern keeper will pour you a free mug of ale - blood - on your first visit. You can drink it with Constitution 18 or try to mask doing so with [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 15 and Perception or [Bluff](/bluff/) 15.
** The latter earns you minor [Shady](/shady/) disposition, and major [Skulduggery](/skulduggery/) relationship change ([Maia](/maia/) or [Serafen](/serafen/))
* He'll tell you a bit about Splintered Reef. You can ask about [Zulka](/zulka/) and [Menzzago](/menzzago/).
}}
[Category:Splintered Reef characters](/categorySplinteredReefCharacters/)

'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

== Background ==
{{Description|The man at the bar goes about his business in merry defiance of the fact that he appears to be semi-decomposed.

Behind him, a dwarf hangs upside down over a barrel. Blood streams down into the bucket from a wound in his wrist. From time the time the dwarf twitches feebly.}}

==Interactions==
